data.title: Non-denominational Church Greenville, SC
data.meta_description: Devoted to Building Family, Blessing Neighbors, and Bringing Good News to the Nations.
data.text:
Illuminate Youth is a mentor-led youth gathering for middle and high school students focused on following Jesus into young adult life. Illuminate Youth gathers twice a month Sundays at 10:30 downstairs during service. Get dates, contact, and update information here.

Volunteering on is an important way to connect and serve at CITYLIGHTS Church. If you are a member of CL, or plan on becoming one and want to serve in worship, hospitality, coffee, childrenâs, media, communication, or other area, join a team or find out more here.

CITYLIGHTS Church gathers every Sunday at 9 and 10:30 for Sunday Service. If you are visiting let us know at the Next Steps Table and weâd love to help you get checked in for kids and get to know you. Our services are designed for building relationship, so dress is casual and coffee is always served!

CITYLIGHTS Church owns an old mill property on the Swamp Rabbit Trail next to the Swamp Rabbit Grocery Store. We are currently in a contract to develop our property into a future church home and location to build relationship with people on the trail in surrounding neighborhoods.

CITYLIGHTS Church currently has around 200 members and another 100 or so regular attenders. More than growing to be a big or small church we aim and fostering a healthy church. The heart of our church is CITYgroups and believe church grows healthy through mutual devotion to bread, Word, and prayer.

Childrenâs Ministry is offered for infant through 5th grade during our 9:00 Sunday Service. Children join our service for worship with their families and are led downstairs by our Childrenâs Ministry team for teaching Â and small group time.
